Translations.Text: Initiator de heavens ter. Kiel Li can fil when Li hav neniam hav mate Li kre all ajx Li est fully aware da all ajx
Such est DI your Lord tie ne est di escept Li Creator all ajx! Vi worship Him sol. Li est en control de all ajx
Ne vizi encompass Him Li encompasses all vizi! Li est Compassionate Cognizant
Enlightenments ven vi your Lord As por those seg ili do por their own bon those turn blind do tial their own detriment. Mi ne est your guardian
Ni tiel eksplik revelations pruv ti vi ricev knowledge clarify them popol kon
Sekv ki revealed vi your Lord tie ne est di escept Li disregard idol worshipers
Hav DI willed ili ne worshipped idols! Ni ne appoint vi their guardian nor est vi their advokat
Ne curse idols ili set DI lest ili blaspheme curse DI ignorance! Ni ornam works de cxiu grup en their okul. Ultimately ili return their Lord tiam Li inform them de cxio ili done
Ili jxur DI solemnly mirakl ven them ili surely kred. Dir Mirakl ven nur el DI. all vi kon mirakl did ven them ili ad disbelieve
Ni control their mens their kor Do ekde their decision est disbelieve ni las them their transgressions blundering
